Tucson relies on his hearing to assess the impact of his attacks on the swe=
eps.  Although he had cleared a majority of them, there were still others t=
o contend with.  But with fear of draining too much energy in vehicle mode,=
 to power the missile cannons, he relies on hand to hand combat, and prepar=
es to go against the sweeps by relying on his Ninjabot skills, rather than =
fire power, to preserve his energy.  He would now use his own body as a shi=
eld and weapon.

" I copy that Rodimus.  Now, let's see if the sweeps are b=
rave enough to face me one on one."

Gracefully, he puts his body into comb=
at position, taking all the stances of a skilled Ninja warrior.  He concent=
rates on listening to what's around him.

"Talon, Lord Elder, they're close=
, watch your backs and your surroundings."

From where Straight Shot and Ku=
p are, Straight Shot too, hears the enemy closing in, as she relays the dat=
a back to Kup.

"Woahh, they're onta us!  Talk about leading ants to a pick=
nic!"

Night Shift now gets into combat position, and draws out a few plasm=
a revolvers.

"Scrap!  Things are definitely gonna get ugly out here.  And =
I hate ta say it but we're outnumbered and unless we get creative, we're hi=
story."

Straight Shot replies while in Kup's grip.

"He's right Kup, I thi=
nk I need to switch ammo to EMP charged arrowheads.  That might be able to =
help throw the remaining sweeps off their afterburners, and it's the only c=
hance we got of actually evading disaster out here."

She takes a moment to=
 callibrate her auto loading system to pick up the EMP arrowheads.

"Okay, =
locked'n loaded.  It's up to you now, Kup."

Meanwhile, Rat Trap is quick t=
o find a tiny hole to disappear into, as he points to it while still with W=
indlord.

"Psst, follow me Windlord, over there, see?  That hole.  We can f=
it and they can't.  When in doubt, hide it out."

Back at the Ark, Quickstr=
ide is on top alert, as he sees the wave of energy pass by.  He's quick to =
get into robot mode at the sight of it.

"Woahh hello!  What the scrap was =
that?!  Rodimus, we got activity out here, of an unknown origin!  I saw som=
e energy waves, but nothing positive to identify!  Whatever it is, it's inv=
isible, and it's using some sort of cloaking device ta maneuver!  I'm gonna=
 attempt to get a fix on it."

He quickly dashes down to where he had seen =
the waves, and keeps alert with his cannon aimed over his shoulder.

"Come =
out, come out wherever you are....  You can't hide behind an invisible barr=
ier for too long, without running out of energy...."

dlord and Rat Trap watched the tower began to

ened in its side, like some great jaw or perhaps

 part of the base's wall itself began to separate

n to close.

ack at the Ark Rodimus received Tuscon's message. "Gotcha." He

 quickly began to fortify the Ark's shielding. "Shield at 100%" he

o Tuscon.
